Events.PreEventString: In the recycle bin, you see a perfectly functional $1 inside.
Events.PostEventString: You pick it up and continue on your way.

Events.PreEventString: In the middle of a room, a raging $1 is thrashing around.
Events.PostEventString: After the power overloading it dissipates, the Pokemon calmly leaves away, leaving $1 behind.

Events.PreEventString: Inside of a glass panel, a purple evolution crystal is connected to a number of cables. It whispers: YE WHO SEEK AWAKENING, LET US BEGIN.
You find an old first-aid kit.
Events.PostEventString: Your Pokemon have recovered some health.

Events.PreEventString: You find an old first-aid kit.
Events.PostEventString: Your Pokemon have recovered from their status conditions.

Events.PreEventString: A young $1 appears in front of you and starts flexing. It's showing off!
Events.PostEventString: It decides to follow you, show you what it's made of.

Events.PreEventString: You walk on top of a decrepit catwalk.
Events.PostEventString: It obviously was a terrible idea! You and your Pokemon have sustained a bit of damage.

Events.PreEventString: You arrive to an area that is partly flooded.
Events.PostEventString: Unfortunately, a live wire is touching the water! $1 is electrocuted!

Events.PreEventString: $1 is in the Abandoned Plant, as lost as you are. 'The only thing to do now is to battle!' They heal your pokemon to full health.
Events.PostEventString: $1 goes home defeated. You continue onwards.

Events.PreEventString: You find an old ATM machine on a wall.
You find some Team Paradox members carrying a crate full of blank disks. You are extremely suspicious of them.
Events.PostEventString: They give you $1 as a bribe to look away.

Floors.ShortcutClue: You see a chair-lift system that is currently turned off. If you give it a shock, it may start up.
Floors.ShortcutResolution: Your $1 starts the machine back again, allowing you to descend to the next part of the mountain.

Floors.ShortcutClue: The next slope is not so steep, so you may be able to slide down with the right move...
Floors.ShortcutResolution: Your $1 lets you slide down to the bottom of the mountain!

Floors.ShortcutClue: You have reached the base of the mountain, but the area is strangely deserted. Better investigate around for a while.

BossEvent.PreEventString: You reach the power plant's generator. The energy in this room is out of control. In the center, absorbing most of the energy a titan made of pure electricity. Before you can react, it starts moving all over the place...
BossEvent.PostEventString: As you defeat the titan, the whole power plant starts to make a deafening noise. Parts start moving. Your actions here have are changing the world.

CampingEvent.PreEventString: You find an abandoned staff cafeteria. The perfect place for a picnic.
CampingEvent.PostEventString: But now it's time to move on...

PostBossEvent.PreEventString: All the legendary titans were first created in the image of Regigigas.
PostBossEvent.PostEventString: From the moment they were born, a great task fell in their hands...
